    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move()
        Increases/decreases the x- and y-position according to the current speed and rotation, unless it is hindered. Furthermore, a raised flatbed will hinder the Truck from moving.
        Specified by:
        move in interface IMovable
        Overrides:
        move in class Vehicle

      • speedFactor

        double speedFactor()
        Specified by:
        speedFactor in class Vehicle

      • getFlatbedAngle

        public double getFlatbedAngle()
        Gets the current angles of the flatbed of the object
        Returns:
        the angle of the flatbed

      • getFlatbedOpen

        public boolean getFlatbedOpen()
        Returns whether the flatbed is open (usable) or closed (not useable).
        Returns:
        a boolean of true (open) or false (closed)
